document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing Ulgar's Isle near the center.
document_data.name: Ulgar's Isle
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulgar's Isle''', or '''Ulgar Isle''', was an island in the [[Pirate Isles]] in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. It was inhabited by the [[Chessenta]]n [[vampire]] [[Ulgar]] and his [[undead]] minions.
document_data.History: In an attempt to ally with Ulgar, the [[Twisted Rune]] sent shiploads of slaves to the isle for the vampire to feast upon. The organization hoped that satiating Ulgar's bloodlust would stabilize him enough for them to learn his secrets.
